!bm begin
quasi-bot BOT 11/12/2022 8:21 PM
This event will involve a lot of bot commands and exploration. Use bot commands to explore your surroundings, and find small quests for rewards. You can explore an area, look at objects, or interact with objects using the command for the area. ex: <pf> is the command for the petrified forest area, and if you wish to look at a gnarled tree, you'd type <!pf gnarled tree> to do so. Actions to take or things to look at will most often required one-three words, and will never require more than four words. If you discover a quest, do a short rp relating to that quest. You are free to rp ANY of the involved npcs to facilitate this.

~==============oOo==============~ The marketplace is the entire purpose for this oasis journey, and it seems to glow with color. People dart between elaborate stalls that proudly display their goods, and colored cloth is draped overhead to protect the shoppers from the heat of the desert sun. Scents of sweat, spices, and incense permeate the area, and laughter and bargaining can be heard all about. ~==============oOo==============~

"You know, this somehow reminds me of some of Dreto's marketplaces... just...! it is quite hot!" Rue BOT 11/15/2022 6:02 PM
Rue had taken notice of Eli’s struggles within the desert heat. Though she wasn’t certain how well he would take her offering potential…clothing advice…to help combat such heat. She knows some can be rather defensive or proud of their style and she would hate to offend one by accident. “D-does it?” She questions with a tilt of her head. Eyes taking note of the other fanning themself due to the heat. “Does that m-mean you mayhaps find….a hint of ..comfort? Amongst th-these stalls?” She honestly wouldn’t have taken such a prosperous city as Dreto to have such similarities with Triem Sha. Though what could she say! She barely knows anything about the region other than it’s casino! Her eyes continue to settle upon Eli. Focusing more so on how he seemed to grow more weary in the desert sun by the minute. So pushing aside her worries of earlier….finally, she would speak up and suggest— “Y-you know…we— well…th-there are some…selections of attire here…th-that c-could certainly h-help you combat the h-heat here.” “B-b-but it is merely a suggestion if y-you should like to ch-check them out!”
